about_the_game:
The Animal Apocalypse has begun!
Play thrhough the epic, totally normal and definitly 100% serious storyline of Anipocalypse!
Shoot your way through hordes of zombies and mutated animals of all kinds. Go in guns blazing in the forest, or go stealth mode with a sniper on a rooftop.
Meet other survivors, do sidequests, fight zombies and mutant animals, learn cheatcodes from your uncle, and complete super useful tutorials!

Your mission:
You, John Jonas Johnson, are the last super soldier of the secret government experiment "Project Super Soldier" You are the only one who can complete this most important mission. Bring the super important intel to the last operational lab facility in the country, and we might be able to stop the Apocalypse and save humanity.

Expand your arsenal!
Fight impending death with stopping power in all shapes and sizes, wether you prefer spraying and preying with an AK or an SMG, or you'd rather stay in the treeline with a sniper, we got you! Anipocalypse offers a wide variety of guns for different playstyles. And with your mechanical arms, you'll have nearly zero recoil! Just watch your Arm Durability, if your arms break down, you're in big trouble...

PVP against your friends!
With the optional Multiplayer Mode, you can battle your friends on different maps based on iconic in-game locations! Using different story-charatcers and their specialized skills.

Grind for epic gun skins!
If you're anything like the developer of this game, you LOVE gun skins. Anipocalypse offers challenges that will seamlessly blend into regular gameplay, to unlock shiny new gun skins for all you completionists out there! And if you're good at finding secrets, there might be some skins in store for you too!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains depictions of realistic violence, blood, gore, and crude language/humor.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Anipocalypse is a humoristic post-apocalyptic first-person shooter. Use an arsenal of guns to shoot your way through hordes of zombies and mutated animals to complete your mission in this first-person "bullet-hell" shooter!
